snippet: A group of 78 former United Football League players and team staff members are suing the U.F.L.’s founder and chairman, William Hambrecht.
abstract: Group of former United Football League players and team staff members file lawsuit against UFL founder and chairman William Hambrecht, claiming they did not get paid after partial cancellation of 2012 season.
lead_paragraph: A group of 78 former United Football League players and team staff members are suing the U.F.L.’s founder and chairman, William Hambrecht.
